-- This script will create a Serverless Database for the demos with some
-- settings that are best practice and make it the database behave as expected

-- #############################################################################
-- DON'T FORGET TO CHOOSE BUILT-IN AND THE CORRECT DATABASE
-- ALSO PLEASE CHANGE THE SCRIPT TO MATCH CORRECT DB AND IDENTITIES
-- #############################################################################

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
--  Create Serverless Database
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- RUN IN MASTER DATABASE
CREATE DATABASE [DemoServerlessDB];
GO

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
--  Allow Purview to index data that are stored in the SQL Pool
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- RUN IN MASTER DATABASE
CREATE LOGIN [demomdwhpvw001weu] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
GO

-- RUN IN EACH USER DATABASE
CREATE USER [demomdwhpvw001weu] FOR LOGIN [demomdwhpvw001weu];
ALTER ROLE db_datareader ADD MEMBER [demomdwhpvw001weu]; 
GO
